comment: Fixed merged (categories and models) nodes visibility. Changed `@beta` APIs in a **breaking** way: `ModelsTreeVisibilityHandlerOverrides.getModelDisplayStatus` and `ModelsTreeVisibilityHandlerOverrides.getCategoryDisplayStatus` - `id` and `categoryId` props are now of `Id64Arg` type instead of `Id64String`. Use `Id64` from `@itwin/core-bentley` to access individual IDs.
